meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.7 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.7 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.2 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.2 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x and Log4j 2 CVE-2021-44228
meta.summary: A recent CVE-2021-44228 has been disclosed that affects the Log4j 2 library. The Vert.x project can optionally use Log4j but does not ship it and therefore is not affected by this CVE.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.10 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.10 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.6 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.6 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.1 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.1 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community
